sources.title: The Third Visitor
sources.description: Title: The Third Visitor Summary: Mr. Richard Carling is found dead in his home with a house full of suspects. Directed by: Maurice Elvey Actors: Sonia Dresdel, Guy Middleton, Hubert Gregg Production Company: Elvey-Gartside Productions Release Date: January 1951 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Mr. Richard Carling is found dead in his home with a house full of suspects.

metadata.Plot: Mr. Richard Carling is found dead in his home with a house full of suspects.
metadata.Actors: Sonia Dresdel, Guy Middleton, Hubert Gregg
